topic.title: Upgrade Yeastar Click to Call
topic.shortdesc: Yeastar Click to Call will be updated automatically if there's a new version.

body.p: The Google Chrome Browser periodically checks new versions of installed extensions and update the extensions without user intervention.

After Yeastar Click to Call is updated with newly added permissions, when you click a phone number and select Linkus to dial out for the first time, system will prompt you all permissions that are granted to Yeastar Click to Call and require authorization from you.
